config.craftingtweaks.title: Crafting Tweaks
config.craftingtweaks.common.compressReq: Set this to false if you want the (de)compress feature to work outside of crafting GUIs (only works if installed on server while in the player inventory)
config.craftingtweaks.common.compressDen: A list of modid:name entries that will not be crafted by the compress key.
config.craftingtweaks.client.rightClickC: If set to true, right-clicking the result slot in a crafting table will craft a full stack.
config.craftingtweaks.client.hideVanilla: We both know JEI is much better. This option hides Vanilla's crafting book button instead of moving it.
config.craftingtweaks.client.mode.toolti: Set to 'DEFAULT' to enable both buttons and hotkeys. Set to 'BUTTONS' to enable buttons only. Set to 'HOTKEYS' to enable hotkeys only. Set to 'DISABLED' to disable completely.
config.craftingtweaks.client.disabledAdd: Add mod ids here of mods that you wish to disable Crafting Tweaks support for.
